trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> event occurs after a form is closed, either by the user, through the user interface (UI), or programmatically, through calls to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> class.
trans-unit.target: L' <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>evento si verifica dopo la chiusura di un form, da parte dell'utente, tramite l'interfaccia utente (UI), o a livello di programmazione tramite le chiamate ai metodi, ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A>in una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>classe o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A>nella <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>

trans-unit.source: If a form has any child or owned forms, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> event is also raised for each one.
trans-unit.target: Se un form dispone di un form figlio o proprietà, un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>evento viene generato anche per ciascuno di essi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>

trans-unit.source: The FormClosedEventArgs class provides data for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> event.
trans-unit.target: La classe FormClosedEventArgs fornisce dati per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> property provides the reason why the form is being closed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs.CloseReason%2A>proprietà fornisce il motivo per cui il form viene chiuso.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs.CloseReason%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The `closeReason` parameter is used to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il `closeReason` parametro viene utilizzato per inizializzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs.CloseReason%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs.CloseReason%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CloseReason"></xref> value that represents the reason why the form was closed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CloseReason"> </xref> valore che rappresenta il motivo della chiusura il form.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates why the form was closed.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica i motivi della chiusura del form.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> can be closed because of a variety of reasons, both user-initiated and programmatic.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>può essere chiusa a causa di una serie di motivi, avviata dall'utente sia a livello di codice.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> property indicates the reason for the closure.
